messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Could you please provide your latitude and longitude coordinates so that I can help you find your location?
I don't have that info on me.

No problem! If you have access to a map application or GPS on your device, you can usually find your latitude and longitude in the location settings. Alternatively, if you can provide the name of a city or place near you, I can help you find information about that location.
I don't have a map app or GPS either.
That's okay! If you're able to share any details about your surroundings, such as landmarks, street names, or nearby shops, I might be able to assist you in identifying your location.
I'm not really sure what's around me right now.

I understand. Without specific information about your surroundings, it can be challenging to determine your location. If you find any details, even general observations like the type of area (urban, rural, etc.) or any visible signs, please let me know. Alternatively, if you can ask someone nearby or check for local signs or markings, that might help too!
